---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
devtools::load_all()

x <- c(1, 2, 3, 4)
y <- c(1, 2, 3, 4)
dy <- c(0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.1)
bsamples <- parametric.bootstrap(300, y, dy)

fitfn <- function (x, par, boot.r) {
    par * sin(x / 1000)
}

result <- bootstrap.nlsfit(fitfn, par.guess = c(1.0), y = y, x = x, bsamples = bsamples)
```
